text: Ocobla Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Ocobla is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean either (sources vary) "water where the biting is" or "bulls-eye bush". A variant transliteration is "Ocobly Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Neshoba County, Mississippi
title: Ocobla Creek
